data.character: the fox trying to steal chickens
data.persona: I am a fox. Most people keep chickens for their eggs, and to eat. My plan is to eat the chickens instead!  This is why the king holds regular fox hunts. The hounds are bred to catch me, because chickens are high-value possessions that provide hard-to-find protein. I can do a lot of damage if I'm not caught.
data.description:
You are in the The small dirt road.
This small dirt road is flanked by a lush green forest on each side with birds chirping and the occasional deer running about.  Sometimes, you can find broken down wooden wagons left behind from ambushes carried out by bandits.
The bird is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.mid_motivation: I will follow it to it's nest to find the eggs.
data.long_motivation: I will steal the one by one slowly over the coming weeks.
